title: 24-hour fitness center with separate yoga room
posting_body: ['Your Life Center Stage', 'Cast a spotlight on your new home at Venue and be the star of your own show at Venue Apartments in San Jose, CA.', 'Here at Venue, you can stand out from the crowd - or just mingle and blend in at one our many social and media spaces.', 'Network with friends at our state-of-the-art outdoor media hub or conference rooms and entertain at the beautiful pool, outdoor fireplace lounge or chic resident lounge with WiFi.', 'For some me time, take advantage of our 24 hour athletic center with yoga studio.', 'Venue in San Jose, CA offers modern living in the perfect location.', 'Located in the heart of North San Jose, Venue is only a short walk away from Baypointe Light Rail Station and merely blocks from Cisco and a short commute to other Silicon Valley employers.', 'Forget living in the background.', 'Let life take center stage at Venue Apartments in San Jose, CA.', 'Call Now:', 'show contact info', 'Use the link below for more details:', '<URL>', 'This is a Studio, 1 Bath', 'Features', '- Built-in desk/ computer station*', '- Multiple outlets for Internet, cable TV, phones throughout', '- Wide oval tubs with ceramic tile surrounds', '- Choice of medium or dark wood-tone cabinets', '- Kitchens:', '- Porcelain tile flooring', '- Dual master closets*', '- French door to patio or balcony with storage', '- In-home washer/dryer', '- Kitchen island*, breakfast bar*, pantry', '- High nine-foot ceilings with lighted ceiling fans and track lighting', '- Master suites:', '- Baths with polished quartz vanities, framed mirrors', '- Clean steel appliances: gas range, microwave and Energy Star® refrigerator & dishwasher', '- Dual sink vanities*', '- Quartz countertops in two color choices', '- And more:', '- Oversized double-pane windows with 2" blinds', '* select homes', 'Community Amenities', '- Card access garage and pedestrian entries', '- Resident business center and WiFi cafe', '- Outdoor', 'fireplace lounge', '- Relaxing spa', '- charging stations available', 'Pet Policy', 'We are pet friendly!', 'Please visit our website for additional details.', 'Income Requirements:', '3 times the monthly rent', 'Office Hours', 'Monday 11:00 - 5:00', 'Tuesday, Thursday, Friday 10:00-6:00', 'Wednesday 11:00 - 6:00', 'Saturday 10:00-5:00', 'Sunday CLOSED', 'Venue', '3737 Casa Verde Street, San Jose, CA, 95134', 'Photos on this ad may
